alert.note: Alert for Adams; Jay; Wells (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 16 at 5:59PM EDT by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Wells, southern Adams and northeastern Jay Counties through 630 PM EDT... At 559 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles north of Pennville, or 9 miles west of Berne, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Nusiance flooding may accompany this storm. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Berne and Geneva around 615 PM EDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
